name: There and Back (Viking edition)
description:
My first game jam submission (VimJam). Have fun playing my little project if you happen to stumble upon it.

The rules are simple: To win a level you need to get to the orange flag and back.

Movement: WASD or arrow-keys (game has wall-jump)

Check out the little level in the title scene to play around with the controls a bit.

You can beat your own previous run by collecting more gems or finishing the level faster. 

Happy to hear your thoughts on the concept :)
